introduction.section1: Indonesia is the largest archipelago in the world. Going from 13,000 to 16,000 islands in 5 years, nobody knows exactly how many islands it is composed of. There are still unexplored and unnamed islands. On the other side, several islands are famous and touristy.
introduction.section2: Trek on the volcanoes of Java, rice fields and temples in Bali, hike in the tropical forests of Sumatra, rest on the beaches of Lombok or find out the dragons of Komodo Island.
introduction.section3: Discover Indonesia through our articles and photos.

google-description: Discover the gorgeous islands of Indonesia through our articles and our photos. Follow us to find our selection of must-see places. For each place visited we try to transcribe our visit as best as possible by telling you: Where to go? How to get there? Why? When? How long and at what period?
social-network-description: Trek on the volcanoes of Java, rice fields and temples in Bali, hike in the tropical forests of Sumatra, rest on the beaches of Lombok or find out the dragons of Komodo Island. Follow our guide from island to island to discover our selection of must-see places.

tour.title: Travel around
tour.subtitle: The country from island to island
